required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of XmAb®7195 in Adult Healthy Volunteers and Adult Subjects With a History of Allergic Rhinitis and/or Allergic Conjunctivitis and/or Atopic Dermatitis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled, Ascending Dose Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of XmAb®7195

brief_summary.textblock: This first-in-human (FIH) study is a randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, ascending dose study to investigate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of XmAb7195 in adult healthy volunteers and in adult subjects with elevated IgE levels.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events including type and severity
primary_outcome.time_frame: Date of randomization up to Day 43
primary_outcome.description: Number, type and severity of adverse events, vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECGs), laboratory tests, and physical examinations will be reported during the study from randomization up to Day 43

primary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events including type and severity of a priming IV dose followed by an escalating second IV dose
primary_outcome.time_frame: Date of randomization up to Day 36
primary_outcome.description: Number, type and severity of adverse events, vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECGs), laboratory tests, and physical examinations will be reported during the study from randomization up to Day 36

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood concentration of XmAb7195 and blood levels of human anti-human antibodies after single-dose IV administration of XmAb7195
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time of dosing up to Day 43
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmocokinetic (PK) analysis for levels of XmAb7195 will be determined in subjects blood from time of initial dosing up to Day 43

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood concentration of XmAb7195 and blood levels of human anti-human antibodies after a priming IV dose followed by an escalating second IV dose of XmAb7195
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time of dosing up to Day 36
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of human anti-human antibodies will be assessed from time of dosing up to Day 36

intervention.description: Part 1 and 2: Single IV infusion of XmAb7195 or placebo Part 3: Two-dose sequential IV infusion of XmAb7195 or placebo on Day 1 and Day 8

overall_official.affiliation: Parexel Baltimore Early Phase Clinical Unit

facility.name: Parexel Baltimore Early Phase Clinical Unit
